translations: adj.（通常用于动词后修饰主语）未受协助的；无助的

sentences.sentence: Inspection technology allows more than 100 million measurements a second to be made across the ribbon, locating flaws the unaided eye would be unable to see.
sentences.translation: 检测技术可以在一秒钟内对玻璃带进行超过1亿次的测量，从而定位肉眼无法看到的瑕疵。

sentences.sentence: There have been at least thirteen previous attempts to reach the North Pole unaided.
sentences.translation: 以前至少有十三次尝试独立到达南极的努力。
